mapper.sql: id, app_id, app_name, target_url, `order`, create_user, update_user, create_time, update_time, deleted
mapper.select:
select
from route where deleted=0 order by create_time desc
mapper.insert:
insert into route
app_id,
app_name,
target_url,
`order`,
create_user,

update_time,
deleted,
